title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 502.3 - Availability and accessibility of materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 502.3 - Availability and accessibility of materials

State Regulations

Materials cited in this Part are available for inspection and
copying at the following locations at the Office of Mental Health: (a) New York State Office of Mental Health, Records Access Office, Counsel's Office, 44 Holland Avenue, Albany, NY 12229, telephone (518) 474-1331; Monday through Friday, 9 a.m.-5 p.m. (b) New York State Office of Mental Health, Library, Counsel's Office, 44 Holland Avenue, Albany, NY 12229, telephone (518)
474-1331; Monday, 9 a.m.-3:30 p.m.; Tuesday through Friday, 9:30-11:30
a.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
502.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
